Text: I strongly recommend people not share this. I got a DMCA letter from them. They will enforce protection of their copyrights. Their stuff is high quality but I chose to delete it all after I got the letter.

So they sent a letter to your home address?
Or your e-mail address? (which they of course knew)
Yeh, right - and babies arrive with the stork!
How stupid do you think people are?

Thanks a lot, kukamonga! Those audio lectures are really helpful for my university classes. :)
A great upload!
